videos.heading: Aboard the Western Flyer, Stanford students study science and literature
videos.subheading: The Western Flyer, the same fishing vessel that novelist John Steinbeck chartered to the Sea of Cortez, is restored and used as part of a three-week course for Stanfordâ€™s Sophomore College program.

videos.heading: Highlights from Big Ideas in Sustainability with Jeanne Gang
videos.subheading: Jeanne Gang, architect and founding partner of Studio Gang, joined the Stanford Doerr School of Sustainability for a discussion on Jan. 16 about shaping healthy and livable communities through design.
